oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hill's Chapel AME Church: Alfred Lee Marlin funeral program
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martin's Funeral Home
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hill's Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church
Funeral service program for Mr. Alfred Lee Marlin that was held on Sunday, October 20, 1974 at Hill's Chapel AME Church in Bell Buckle, Tennessee. Marlin was buried at Cortner Cemetery.

Hill's Chapel AME Church dates from at least the 1920s. Rev. Robert Gardner served as the pastor in 1980. At the time of fieldwork, the church building was in a state of disrepair and no longer utilized as a meeting space.

programs;
